headline: Equinix (EQIX) Valuation Check After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: With no single headline event driving attention, Equinix (EQIX) is drawing investor interest because of its data center business, recent share price strength, and current valuation signals. See our latest analysis for Equinix. The recent move in Equinix’s share price to $974.26, alongside a 1 month share price return of 19.37% and 90 day share price return of 29.33%, contrasts with a 1 year total shareholder return of 10.20%. This suggests short term momentum has picked up against a steadier...

headline: How The Equinix (EQIX) Investment Story Is Shifting With Fresh Targets And 2026 Guidance
summary: Equinix is back in focus as analyst fair value estimates shift from US$1,008.31 to US$1,023.27, a modest reset that still matters if you are tracking entry points and long term expectations. The update sits alongside a cluster of higher Street targets, with some firms pointing to 2026 guidance and record gross bookings, while others remain more measured within the broader REIT group. As you read on, you will see how these moving targets fit together and how you can keep up with the evolving...
